author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Mylan Receives Tentative Approval For Combination HIV Treatment DTG/FTC/TAF Under FDA's Pepfar Program
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Mylan Nv:
* MYLAN RECEIVES TENTATIVE APPROVAL FOR COMBINATION HIV TREATMENT DTG/FTC/TAF UNDER FDA‘S PEPFAR PROGRAM
* MYLAN NV - ‍ ANTIRETROVIRAL WILL BE IMMEDIATELY AVAILABLE IN DEVELOPING COUNTRIES AS A FIRST-LINE REGIMEN FOR PEOPLE BEING TREATED FOR HIV/AIDS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
